title: Fringe, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips wound on a silk core)
Technique: soumak weave
description: Red and gold metallic thread form a soumak heading. Band in a trellis design of gold metallic thread above skirt threads of twisted red threads.
